solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public boolean checkPerfectNumber(int num) {--newline--        if (num == 1) return false;--newline--        --newline--        int sum = 0;--newline--        for (int i = 2; i <= Math.sqrt(num); i++) {--newline--            if (num % i == 0) {--newline--                sum += i + num / i;--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        sum++;--newline--        --newline--        return sum == num;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
